name: Scrolling card names for Dueling Nexus (Sample)
description:
In the deck editor, sometimes a name is too large to display. This code allows the names to scroll over the image on hover to allow more space to read. It affects the right column of the editor screen.

Open for testing and feedback.
additional_info: This is a part of the Scrollbars project I'm working on with Skeletonxf. It's also a preview to a future update of my Jaden and Yubel theme. Check out Skeletonxf's style here.
